## **Section 3: Derivatives in R**

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

\# A. Find the slope of f(x)= x2 at x=3

```{r}


fx <- expression (x^2)
df_dx <- D(fx , 'x')
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)


```
